author: Clare Wilson
title: Could the coronavirus trigger post-viral fatigue syndromes?
description: Conditions like chronic fatigue syndrome have been linked to viral infections, so it’s possible that the covid-19 virus may go on to trigger similar conditions
content:
By Clare Wilson
Rita Hayashi/Getty
COULD the coronavirus sweeping around the world have a second illness following in its wake? We may expect to see an outbreak of post-viral fatigue syndromes in some people who have had covid-19, according to some research… [+2927 chars]
